snippet.title: MOMENTUM Demo Arcade & Puzzle Gameplay PC/Android
snippet.description:
A minimalistic one-button-game - dash, rotate, collect pickups, crack the highscore!
GET THE FREE DEMO HERE: https://neonchameleon.itch.io/momentum
FOLLOW US ON FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/Momentumgame...

MOMENTUM is a minimalistic one-button game. Use dash- and rotationpoints to move through the levels and collect as many pickups as possible to crack the highscore!

MOMENTUM started out as a 2nd semester student project of the Game Design program at HTW Berlin and is in continued development since, with a release date to  still be announced (we're taking our time to bring you the best possible experience).

Credits:
    Marlene Käseberg - programming, visuals, level-design
    Zwi Zausch - level design, sound design

former prototyping teammembers:
    Dyako Mahmoudi - programming, level-design
    Hoang Tranh - programming, level-design

Coaches: Susanne Brandhorst, Thomas Bremer
